Job Title: Functional Tester

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
The Public Sector Solutions Group (PS2G) is a technology-driven company that provides innovative solutions to state and local government partners, enabling them to achieve their performance goals and better service constituents at the most critical point of need. With deep knowledge of government programs, IT management systems, application development, and specialized technical expertise, we help our clients succeed while ensuring audit compliance and reporting for federally funded agencies.SummaryWe are seeking a meticulous results-driven Seasonal Readiness - Performance Tester to join our Quality Assurance team. The ideal candidate possesses a blend of functional testing experience and a strong focus on performance optimization. In this role, you will play a crucial part in ensuring the readiness and resilience of our critical software applications during peak seasonal demand.ResponsibilitiesSeasonal Readiness & Performance Testing: Design, execute, and analyze comprehensive performance tests to proactively identify bottlenecks and optimize systems under heavy load. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure our core applications can seamlessly handle surges in user activity.Test Planning and Design: Develop detailed test plans, scenarios, and scripts covering both functional correctness and performance under pressure. Thoroughly understand software specifications and requirements.Performance Test Execution: Employ performance testing tools (e.g., LoadRunner, JMeter) to execute tests across various environments, replicating realistic high-traffic conditions.Performance Analysis and Reporting: Analyze test results, pinpoint performance issues, and provide actionable recommendations to the development team for optimization. Prepare insightful reports that clearly communicate findings.Functional Testing Collaboration: Work with functional testers to identify areas where functionality and performance intersect. Ensure that bug fixes and new features don't negatively impact system performance.Defect Reporting and Tracking: Accurately log and track issues in the bug tracking system. Provide detailed descriptions, reproduction steps, screenshots, and performance data as necessary.Communication and Collaboration: Work closely with developers, QA teams, infrastructure teams, and key stakeholders to understand system architecture, share performance insights, and drive improvements.QualificationsMinimum QualificationsBachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field, or equivalent work experience.2-5 years of experience in software testing, with demonstrated expertise in performance testing methodologies.Proficient with performance testing tools such as LoadRunner Cloud, LoadRunner Enterprise, and/or JMeter.Working knowledge of functional testing practices and ability to collaborate with functional testers.Understanding of web-based applications, mobile systems, and APIs.Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.Excellent written and verbal communication skills, including the ability to explain complex technical concepts clearly.Ability to operate effectively within a matrixed team environment and build relationships with diverse stakeholders.Preferred QualificationsExperience in Agile/Scrum development environments.Knowledge of Oracle CC&B systems and corporate testing tools.Familiarity with SQL Developer, Azure DevOps, HP's suite of software tools (ALM, PPM, etc.).Experience with scripting languages (e.g., Python, JavaScript) is a plus.

Experience Level (if available): None
